column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place is only worth it for the coffee or the desserts. We did not enjoy the food we ordered. The tomato basil was immensely salty
column2: my friend couldn't finish it. It did not taste fresh at all. I ordered the ham and cheese baguette. They asked if I wanted it toasted I said yes. Big mistake. The actual taste of the sandwich was good but the bread was SO toasted. It was nearly impossible to eat
column3: every bite was uncomfortable and painful. I wish I could say I was exaggerating but it was hard as a rock
column4: difficult to enjoy a sandwich that way. I would say to be safe stick to ordering a drink and a pastry but maybe stay away from the food menu.
